GANKING (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
As you look at or reveal me from the top of your deck, you may banish me. If you do, you may play me for [rune].

name: Rhasa the Sunderer
rules_text: I cost [1] less for each card in your trash.

rules_text: When you play me, you may play a unit from your trash, ignoring its Energy cost. (You may still pay its Power cost.)

rules_text:

name: Twisted Fate Gambler
rules_text:
When I attack, reveal the top rune of your rune deck, then recycle it. Do one of the following based on its domain:
[fury] - Deal 2 to an enemy unit here and 1 to all other enemy units here.
[mind] - Draw 1.
[order] - Stun an enemy unit.

name: Invert Timelines
rules_text: Each player discards their hand, then draws 4.

ACTION (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
